snippet.title: Riftstorm - Official Pre-Alpha Playtest 2 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Riftstorm is an action co-op roguelite shooter developed by Mythic Alliance. Players will put unique weapon skills and precise movement maneuvers to the test as elite secret operatives going up against the unending threat of cosmic horrors. Fight through waves of challenging dungeons offering high-replayability for solo and co-op play. Riftstorm is launching in 2025 for PC with the ability for players to now request access to the pre-alpha playtest via Steam.

#Gaming #Riftstorm #GameTrailers
